section:
&reftitle.runtime; &extension.runtime;
FrontBase configuration options
&Name; &Default; &Changeable; &Changelog;
fbsql.allow_persistent "1" INI_SYSTEM Available since PHP 4.2.0.
fbsql.generate_warnings "0" INI_SYSTEM Available since PHP 4.0.6.
fbsql.autocommit "1" INI_SYSTEM Available since PHP 4.0.6.
fbsql.max_persistent "-1" INI_SYSTEM Available since PHP 4.0.6.
fbsql.max_links "128" INI_SYSTEM Available since PHP 4.0.6.
fbsql.max_connections "128" INI_SYSTEM Available since PHP 4.0.6.
fbsql.max_results "128" INI_SYSTEM Available since PHP 4.0.6.
fbsql.batchSize "1000" INI_SYSTEM Available since PHP 4.2.0. Removed in PHP 5.1.0.
fbsql.default_host NULL INI_SYSTEM Available since PHP 4.0.6.
fbsql.default_user "_SYSTEM" INI_SYSTEM Available since PHP 4.0.6.
fbsql.default_password "" INI_SYSTEM Available since PHP 4.0.6.
fbsql.default_database "" INI_SYSTEM Available since PHP 4.0.6.
fbsql.default_database_password "" INI_SYSTEM Available since PHP 4.0.6.
&ini.php.constants;
